teal.sim.engine

Class SimEngine.RenderBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Leaf
          • javax.media.j3d.Behavior
            • teal.sim.engine.SimEngine.RenderBehavior
  • Enclosing class:
    SimEngine

    class SimEngine.RenderBehavior
extends javax.media.j3d.Behavior
    RenderBehavior extends the abstract class Behavior, to provide scheduling for the rendering. SimEngine.triggerRender() simply wakes up this behavior which goes on to properly render each viewer.
    See Also:
    Behavior, SimEngine.triggerRender(), SimEngine.renderBehavior

    • Field Detail

      • POST_RENDER

        public static final int POST_RENDER
        PostId used for the standard wakeup criterion, wakeup. This value is used directly in SimEngine.triggerRender(), by invoking postId(int) on the behavior.
        See Also:
        SimEngine.triggerRender(), javax.media.j3d.Behavior.postId(int), Constant Field Values

      • wakeup

        javax.media.j3d.WakeupOnBehaviorPost wakeup
        Standard wakeup criterion, initialized in initialize() to correspond to the postId defined by POST_RENDER.
        See Also:
        initialize()

        RenderBehavior()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the behavior by creating a standard wakeup criterion corresponding to the postId defined by POST_RENDER
        Specified by:
        initialize in class javax.media.j3d.Behavior

      • processStimulus

        public void processStimulus(java.util.Enumeration criteria)
        Iterates through all viewers and invokes the render method on each. Before the iteration, the engine is put in "waiting" state. After the iteration a wakeupOn(...) call is made to rearm the next wakeup.
        Specified by:
        processStimulus in class javax.media.j3d.Behavior
